website_summaries.verdict: While you get a lot of pieces in this large kit, others on our list have better warmers and higher-quality wax, plus some users don't need this many components.
pros: A large kit with 70 accessories that includes wax and warmer, various sized spatula applicators, strips, pre- and post-wax sprays and more – a good value for the price
cons: The wax warmer takes a long time to heat/melt, and the wax is on the sticky side
Some customers didn't like the scent

customer_reviews.title: This is SO convenient! If you are high maintenance but don't have the time for the salon, get this!
customer_reviews.text: This starter kit is so good! It warms up fast and came with mostly everything that I would need. I would highly recommend buying the clean collars for this because it can get messy and it is a B**ch to clean up! I would but this over again! I love the convenience of this kit and how easy it was to use at home seeing as I don't always have the time or money to constantly go and get a wax! ***I tried to use this as a Brazilian wax and it was horrible! So don't make the same mistake that I did! Buy the special Brazilian wax for that!! lol***
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn Fordyce

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars, I would. This product does not work AT ALL. I have tried multiple times, following the instructions exactly and it does NOTHING to remove hair. All it does is leave sticky wax everywhere and it's awful to try to get off. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: not worth it!!!! need a refund
customer_reviews.text: Something must be wrong with the heat on this machine because the wax never fully melted, not even half way - so the wax was unusable. I had the machine set on high and had the wax melting for an hour and it barely melted! My friend recommended me this Kit because she said it worked for her. I told her about my experience and she was surprised because she is able to use hers all the time without any problem
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: Good wax kit but came with broken lid
customer_reviews.text: I really like this waxing kit. It has everything you need. First time I ordered it, it worked great. I accidentally tipped it over after I used it and didn’t notice so I messed it up. I got a new one and the lid come broken... packing was pretty secure so I’m not to sure how it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Niikky Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Not legit branding. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a legi Gigi Wax Kit. I ordered it and have just now been able to open it only to find that the products have been opened previously and taped closed. Completely unsanitary and NOT what I payed for. My window for return has closed as of February 14th. As I have just now opened to find this is a fraud I will be looking into recieving my $40 back.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Jackson

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this looking for a better waxing kit than the one I have currently, THIS THING IS TERRIBLE. DONT BUY. I read the steps and tried at least a dozen times and all I did was make a mess and in pain because of it. It doesn’t pull hair out! It doesn’t even dry enough Or adhere enough for you to pull off the entire thing. There’s pieces of wax left where you had the strip and you have to use a remover to get it off. Who wants to do an extra step when the whole point is it to be quick and painless?
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: The honey wax is atrocious
customer_reviews.text: All in all a good bang for your buck for all of those starting waxers. You simply cannot find a better deal for all that you get. The honey wax however, is a disaster. Even if you are the neatest person this wax gets on everything and everywhere. It is such an inconvenience and a head ache to handle and remove the honey wax solely turns what could be a simple 30 minute wax to an hour that’s how awful it is. Also, does not remove hair well. It is a struggle to take off fine hairs which shouldn’t be the case for this kind of wax.
customer_reviews.author: Lo_are

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I had one of these when I was a teenager, and last year I realized my mother still had it, and it was still working 12-13 years later, so I finally bought mine, and received it today! Very reliable product, comes with great wax, and everything you need with it. The bottles of product you can tell are old, and not as full as they should be. They didn’t have any seals on them so I am a little hesitant about them, and whether they were used or not, but besides that, the wax machine itself is great!
customer_reviews.author: Tobias Moore

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of my hair stylist not being able to wax me during the corona virus. I’ve used it twice on my eyebrows and I can’t figure out what I’m doing wrong. BUT, I waxed my other half’s chest hair for fun (for me not him) and it worked great. Even drew some blood 😂😂😂😂😂🔪🔪🔪🔪. My kiddo learned a new vocabulary that day, I may open my own business of pain and torture. On a serious note, I do recommend this as this is what my hair stylist uses. I’m just doing something wrong, but it has nothing to do with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. Really good prize for the quality for my first time using it i thought i would burn myself or leave my face really red and nothing it was actually nice and smooth with everything being closed down i cant go get my eyebrows done ....it also comes in handy for ur lil chin hair lol and that mustache us girls sometimes get lol so this is a must have ..
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: Must have for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: This kit was absolutely fantastic for me as a beginner! I get my eyebrows waxed every week... ($12+$3 tip) $15 every time. I finally decided to get a kit and do them myself. I started with my upper lip just to get a feel for what I was doing and then it went just fine for my eyebrows. The wax is easy to use, remover works amazingly, and the slow grow made it feel smooth afterwards! I did cut the sticks in half and wax strips down to smaller sizes for easier use and it will also give you more uses. This kit will last a long time and absolutely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Eudelia

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly. Was excited to open it and get started. Takes about half an hour to warm up to high. Sally's beauty supply sells extra strips and accessories as well if one should require additional items. It works great, I feel that it has already paid for itself since I have already waxed everything multiple times. I have no prior experience waxing, but I am very satisfied with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: USED being sold as NEW
customer_reviews.text: We opened the box and the WAX OFF contents had completely dumped out onto the entire kit. We found the supposed cap in the bottom and it was from a MEDICINE bottle. No twist ties on cords either. Clearly a used and returned piece. No factory seals on box. Probably better to shop at Sally's or other beauty supply.
customer_reviews.author: James D Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical to buy after reading the reviews. I have extremely sensitive skin. It didn't have any reactions to the wax though. It was totally worth the money! The only thing that's annoying is how sticky the wax is. The product that comes with the kit to get the wax off doesn't work that great. Great price also!!!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Broken & Messy! Don’t Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box I immediately was hit with powder! I soon realized the pre epilation powder was open and dumped into the box! None of the lotions had seals and the slow grow only seems half full — so I won’t be using them as they are likely used! The lid to the warmer was also smashed into 2 pieces! Worst unboxing I’ve ever had from Amazon. I called and got a refund, but I don’t recommend buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Carlison

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Not a diy project!!! This wax was so thick and since it never really hardens it’s so hard to tell what you are doing. I didn’t think it was supposed to come with strips. It was way too hard to use, no instructions, and I have major blood vessels burst and bruised in the crease of my leg. Oh and the wax gets EVERYWHERE and the remover is practically worthless. Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: The cloth strips shed thread,  but the rest of it is great!
customer_reviews.text: Used this kit for the first time I tried waxing my own eyebrows and lips. It worked great and all the products out came with helped me with my sensitive skin. The size of sticks were perfect for what I needed and the strips worked okay. I would suggest buying a different kind of removal strip as the wax didn't always stick to it and they shed thread like mad.
customer_reviews.author: Tashina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Saw a lot of reviews saying it didn’t pull out all their hair or there was breakage but I managed fine with short fine leg hair. Very easy to use. Not as painful as people say I PROMISE! Wax did take about 45 min to warm up fully. The waz was pretty easy to take off. All I had to do was rub the “wax off” like lotion a bit rough and it was off. Would recommend for any beginners (:
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Money Saver
customer_reviews.text: My mom had one of these and we would just do our brows at home. I knew I was going to purchase when I moved out. I usually let it take an hour to warm up and it takes me less than 15 minutes to do my brows. Obviously if you're new at it, you have to get used to the process. One of the best purchases I've ever made. Saves me money in the long run and time.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: If this is a gift, make sure. Everything is okay. Before giving it to them.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present from my son. I opened it up. And the lid was broke. Because I didn't want to hurt his feelings. I just closed it. And didn't send it back. That's why I gave this a 3. It was very disappointing to see that. I guess I could have. Contacted Amazon But then my son would have found out and then very disappointed and I wouldn't do that to him.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter set
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I would suggest is getting extra Muslin strips. Not enough comes with it. I am using this on only myself so I redip the same applicator stick into the wax, but if you are using it in a salon I would buy more applicator sticks too, because they should be one time use, no double dipping. Also suggest small sections at a time to make sure u get all hairs out and don’t put the wax on too thick. Over all great set
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Will never buy again
customer_reviews.text: The wax is HORRIBLE. NOTHING will take it off. Even oil doesn’t work. I’m not sure what the wax remover included was supposed to do because it was also crap. Months later and I still can’t get this stuff off my dresser.
customer_reviews.author: S. Usita

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you need to get started!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I trained on and wanted one for home. Super easy to use, dont forget that 3 to 4 week grow out before using! However, I never used the slow grow cream before and I feel like GiGi could do something better with the scent. It reminds me of the smell of a puppy salon? Other than that the product is great and gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Kady

customer_reviews.title: The wax heater didn’t even turn on. Unable to contact  Amazon by chat or phone
customer_reviews.text: I received this product and was so excited to start using it on clients only for it to not even work. The main part of this product is to be able to heat up the wax for application and it doesn’t even work. I followed all instructions, and the switch for high,low functions are ineffective. I’ve never been disappointed by any of my Amazon purchases up until now. Do not purchase, this is a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: VeroF63

customer_reviews.title: Used for years, everything you need to wax
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years! The box got everything you need to wax. When I first started using the product, I took the waxing machine out the box while waxing and the wax got on my floor. I had to use acetone to clean the floor later. >< Tip to avoid this problem: Keep the waxing machine in the box. So the wax will not drip on the floor. place the waxing stick on a waxing sheet so it will not stick on the box and you can continue to use the stick the next time you needed to wax. I don't know whether it is for sensitive skin, since I have thick skin....
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Warm
customer_reviews.text: The warmer did not work at all. Unfortunately I did not open it until after the return window closed. I plugged it in to multiple outlets and tried it on the different heat settings. Let it sit for 30 min and it did not get hot at all so of course the wax did not melt. Very disappointed since the kit came with everything and the products that go with it are great but the whole point is to warm wax which it doesn't do.
customer_reviews.author: MrsB_CO

customer_reviews.title: Yes... Just not the wax that comes with it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter kit... I would just suggest replacing the wax with the Brazilian hard wax. I have more success with getting all the hairs out, not irritating my skin, and easiest to clean up (hard wax). I used the wax that came with this and it was very soft, my skin was red and irritated, and the soft wax is very hard to clean up :/
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Broken cover, seems in used condition when I purchased it new.
customer_reviews.text: When I received this item, it seems like it was used before. The tab to open it up was torn off and the cover had numerous breaks in it. It also appears that a few of the items are missing. I purchased this item new but it really doesn't feel like it. The wifey was really looking forward to getting this for christmas too. Very disappointed. I'm not usually the kind of person to speak to sellers about this sort if thing but this is pretty unacceptable for the amount of money I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Francis

customer_reviews.title: Its a very large wax warmer much larger in person
customer_reviews.text: Cons: A full pot(to 3/4 full) of wax takes about an hour to heat up if on high. Half full wax will take about half hour to heat up. It is also very large-7inches wide by 8 inches long; so it takes up a lot of counter space. Waxing in itself can be messy. Pros: It's really nice to have my own pot of wax to use whenever I want or need to. It's a huge money saver compared to going to a salon. General comments: the kit comes with a large full size pot of wax, and 4 decent sized bottles of other stuff, some strips, and 2 size sticks. Perfect to get started for home-waxing.
customer_reviews.author: terry m.

customer_reviews.title: Best waxing kit
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible product for the price you pay.. I have been looking for a waxing starter kit and this came across my search. Most waxing kits come with the cream wax that I really don’t like so the fact that this one came with the all purpose honey is great! I’m currently studying cosmetology and I’m sure this is going to come in handy along the way.
customer_reviews.author: MT.

customer_reviews.title: For that at home wax job, no matter where.
customer_reviews.text: No more being told "we don't wax that part of your body", lol! Seriously though, I am pleased with this kit. Me and my husband have waxed several times and I did my daughters eyebrows and we have TONS of wax and strips left. I will say you may go to your local beauty store and get a few more wood sticks, but hey, that is a minimal complaint. Overall, great machine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Greene

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Waited so long to receive this kit only to unbox and see that it’s broken. How are you suppose to adjust the temperature with a broken temperature lever??!! Also it won’t turn on and you can hear something like a loose part rattling inside the warmer. Products that came with the kit were not secure and one bottle opened and spilled inside the box. The products are not sealed either with a safety layer cap for our protection. Overall very disappointing not to mention very cheap quality warmer. I like the products just going to purchase a better warmer. I can’t rate it due to it being damaged. Save your money get a better waxing kit.
customer_reviews.author: V.M.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the product worked as expected for beginners. It removed excess hair on my eyebrows and that's the point. The directions could have been ”beginner friendly”, a step-by-step, and the font larger for ease of reading. However, if you have common sense and have paid attention when visiting a salon for your waxing, you should be ok. I was concerned with the crack in the bowl. I'm very picky with products I spend my money on, not only does the product have to work, but the equipment must be intact...brand new. I didn't appreciate receiving a cracked bowl with my purchase. So annoyed by that.
customer_reviews.author: Shauntey M.

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: Finally received mine and the lid was broken .... waited forever to get it just for it to be broken 😭😭😭
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend this kit!
customer_reviews.text: If you know what you’re doing, this wax kit is an amazing starter kit! Wax works well. Kit comes with everything you need. I will update in a couple months, but so far it’s been great. Just like the salons I’ve worked in!
customer_reviews.author: Porcia E

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it is a good product, but let's be honest, it's not for beginners, it's not easy to use, it is very messy, the warming up takes too long, the process takes too long. I will try again, but the first time was pretty much a mess, I don't know, perhaps I just need practice. If you are trying to wax all your body you would need to buy more wax and more strips, the product that comes in the box is not enough. Also, make sure to put some magazine paper, old boxes or something beneath if you don't want everything sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Liz N.

customer_reviews.title: No returns
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a good deal, arrived with the lid already broken. I was planning to use it, hence ordering something with quick shipping.. but now if I intend on finding a way to replace it, it’ll have to sit in the box. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about the lid coming cracked but thought I’d give this a chance anyways. My lid came cracked, poor quality control. Also the Honee wax is horribly messy and the wax remover that comes with the kit doesn’t work at all. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Harju

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've used this kit twice now and it's really easy to use. The instructions are very helpful and clear. The supplies it comes with are great too. My only complaint is that the lid was broken when it arrived but it's not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigha Maksim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: Wow this product is amazing!!!! So easy to use !!! For my first time my thick hairy eyebrows Came out so beautifully! I love it ! Wish I could of posted a video of my before & after Definitely recommend 🙌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true
customer_reviews.text: I've been waxing my own eyebrows for over a decade now. The GiGi waxpot was the first I purchased. When we moved a couple months ago, I decided to replace it for one of the higher rated options on Amazon (with the hard beaded wax).. aaaand I have already replaced it with this. It's a solid pot, lasts for years (when let's be real, using this twice already pays for having eyebrows professionally done), and is easy to use. This particular set is nice because it comes with lotions and powders to use before waxing, and to help get extra wax off your skin or counter. I don't think I'll stray from this brand for home waxing ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Khan

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Has everything you need!! It heats up really quickly which is great- I turn it on, shower/wash hair, and when I get out the wax is ready! I keep everything stored in the original box for easily put away and to keep it organized.
customer_reviews.author: Joslyn

customer_reviews.title: Too bad
customer_reviews.text: I received the machine with the lid broken and the liquids opened without any protection.
customer_reviews.author: Adela Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Wax it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase of this item, it works well and it very easy to use that my daughter kept taking it to use, so I left her keep it and bought myself another one. Great for waxing eyebrows, lip, chin.
customer_reviews.author: Chica

customer_reviews.title: Great waxing kit
customer_reviews.text: Great kit! People complain about this wax saying that is messy snd sticky. My first experience was bad because y melted the wax too much. Now I wait fir the right consistency and It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Isol

customer_reviews.title: A must have for me.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product now for 15 years, easily. This is my first time replacing it since I first bought it. I absolutely love the warmer and wax. Works really well and is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brigette

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m not satisfied with this product at all. The kit is nice and everything however the wax is sticky as hell. I can’t get the wax off my legs or chin and I used the wax removal that comes in the kit and that didn’t work. I then tried taking a bath and using hot water and alcohol to get it off but that didn’t work as well. I’m currently going to sleep with dry wax on my body because this wax is sticky af and nothing seems to work to get it off. I personally would just like my money back because this is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Jaden

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is a beautiful wax kit and it comes with everything that you need to start off with the directions are pretty easy to understand but this is definitely something you need a little help with if you are new to waxing ! My friend is in school for waxing and she’s going to help me it is a little tricky if you have no idea what you are doing ! But great quality for the price ! Will definitely have to purchase more wax strips and sticks but it came with a good amount to start off with.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Hair removal
customer_reviews.text: The kit is good to some extent with all the items that comes with it. I did not like the wax that came with it. So I purchased some hard beads which was a whole lot easier to use because you apply it then pull it off.
customer_reviews.author: Dyvon

customer_reviews.title: Plugged it in right out of the box and the unit did not heat.
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in for the first time and the unit did not heat. Didn't even get warm turned up to high, nothing... stone cold. Removed the bottom panel and discovered a wire disconnected because the connector was not crimped enough to remain seated on the tab. Once I crimped the connector, the connection was secure and the unit heated properly. I chalk that up to poor quality control by the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick M. Knudsen

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love,Love Mine!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my kit and positively love it. It had all the essentials to start at home waxing. I love to have my eyebrows waxed and will usually have it done when I cut/color my hair but this is great for in between those times. I also have a teenage daughter that uses it with me and she also loves it. This will save me a lot money in the long run. Its simple to use and if you have any questions about technique just remember that youtube has plenty of helpful videos so you can feel more confident.
customer_reviews.author: katybug2000

customer_reviews.title: Better than you know
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for when I moved out of my moms house. Growing up I never shaved my mother told me to use this product. But since I am an adult now I was able to learn to use this on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Melindaisous

customer_reviews.title: The lid came cracked like other people have mentioned in their reviews
customer_reviews.text: The lid came cracked like other people have mentioned in their reviews. The wax isn't the best. It's really sticky and never completely becomes hard so you have to use the cloth strips to pull it off. Other than that it's a good little wax warmer. I think I might just buy different wax.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Odom

customer_reviews.title: My Review
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and so far I really am enjoying it.... I find the wax pot werid maybe it's because i never seen one looking loke that but the kit is really nice. The one negative thing about it is that it does not have many applicators so you definitely need to buy more applicators.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wax is MESSY. Warmer gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: This wax sticks to EVERYTHING and is pretty much impossible to get off, even with the wax off product in the kit. I used the wax multiple times and couldn’t figure out the right consistency, so when I’d rip it’d leave all my hair behind. I gave it 3 stars because the warmer works fine. I ended up getting hard wax and it worked much better. I’m still using the pre-wax products and have no problem with them. (I purchased this for Brazilian and underarms).
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hotard

customer_reviews.title: Works like advertised
customer_reviews.text: Sticky sticky sticky.... worth it to continue letting my hairdresser do my waxing! But... it works and does a good job. And this is a good buy for the $$. Actually same kit that my hairdresser uses!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eyebrow waxing at home
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived promptly. The device did work to wax my mom's eyebrows, however, I found that it does take a bit to heat up so I left it on high at first, and then on low. The device came with a plastic purple lid over the wax but mine came broken. I think the packaging was too thin, and not sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: JaimeIsaac

customer_reviews.title: Heat doesn’t regulate well
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for almost 2 years. It works but the heat isn’t not stable. I have to only turn it on for use. I can’t leave it on a few hours. It will get hotter and hotter even in the low setting. I have had wax pots for work that stay a constant temperature all day.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Hagenmaier

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the most expensive waxing kit that I’ve seen, but it’s incredible. I used it to wax my little bit of a mustache and some of my baby hair around my jaw. They really bother me when I have my makeup applied, but I just used this, and my skin as never felt smoother or looked smoother. Painless? No, but not unbearable or even enough to make me say ouch. I will say, the wax remover doesn’t seem to really work? I would say maybe try to find a better wax remover what what you might get on your fingers when opening the package or just the little bit of stickiness that’s left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this set but the actual warmer already stopped working after only 6 months of very little use and always off/unplugged when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: RVR102015

customer_reviews.title: I bought this pot 3 years ago.
customer_reviews.text: So I don’t know what’s changed since I bought this waxing pot. But 3 years later I still use it regularly. I just figured I should write a review after all this time for anyone who wants to know if it’s a good long-term buy. The wax is okay, maybe 4 stars, but it lasts a really long time. The strips are terrible, like 2 or 3 stars. And I rarely used the bottles of other stuff. But keeping in mind the price and what you’re getting, it’s really a great value just for the waxing pot! I buy different strips now.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Plumb

customer_reviews.title: Choose a different wax.
customer_reviews.text: The Gigi Hair Removal Kit was a great buy! However with that being said, I suggest buyers do some research between the differences of using wax vs honey. The honey does work really well once you get the technique down, if you're looking for a quick lay and strip then I recommend using plain wax. All the extra products in the Gigi kit are fabulous primers and after care items, make use of them! You can also purchase the melting pot separately, if interested.
customer_reviews.author: chupprie

customer_reviews.title: The best out there but not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. This is not meant for beginners and it will make a mess if you aren’t super careful but for me it’s the only home wax that works.
customer_reviews.author: Leza

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: Hard to control the temperature of the was, this makes application and removal problematic. You get what you pay for.......
customer_reviews.author: Edward R

customer_reviews.title: Research Led me to buy this.
customer_reviews.text: First time Home Waxing. I really liked this warmer, and kit. It came with everything I needed for my first time. I just went back to purchase more muslin strips, and a hardwax from the same company. Research led me to choose this as the best buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My eyebrows needed care since this Covid started so I figured I should give this a try. I love it!!! I saw some people's comments about it being messy, but I made sure I precut the strips ahead of time, and minimized mess as much as I can. No issues with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: 😖
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says it does. Sure won’t be doing it again though 🤕. To the closet it goes😖
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, beauty schools use this exact brand.
customer_reviews.text: Here’s the deal y’all- I got to beauty school. We use this exact brand for the wax warmers and waxes itself. The wax warmers are easy to use and look pretty nice. Same thing for the honee wax- simple and easy to apply and epilate. My ONLY complaint is the lid for my wax warmer came cracked and broken. Other than that, I’m pretty happy. It comes with all the basic waxing supplies (strips, stick, wax, powder, cleanser). Nice kit to start with but I will definitely be supplementing with extra applicators, muslin, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Warmer and lotions are good, won't recommend the wax
customer_reviews.text: You get what you paid for. Details : - the warner for wax - is ok, simple and doing the job - wax - bad, messy and pulls the skin leaving bruises... and I did try other types of wax and it did not happen before - pre/after lotions - not bad, actually smell good and very gentle - the rest... basic and low key To me, it was worth buying for this price it because I use the lotions and the warmer...
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: All the lids must be cracked
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, as a wax warmer it does the job and I like that this kit has everything you need to get started. BUT my kit also came with a cracked lid, like many other reviews had stated and it did seem like my bottles of products were slightly open in the box. Overall I think this seller just needs to fix these problems...how can all the kids be cracked?! However, if none of this bugs you, the warmer itself works fine and the honey wax that comes with this kit is obviously just for finer facial hair and would not work on more coarse hair.
customer_reviews.author: Miss F.

customer_reviews.title: GO AHEAD AND GET IT THERE'S NOTHING TO LOSE!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, great product for an awesome price and worth more! Can use with other waxes but for all purpose is an awesome wax! My second actually, gave my friend who has her own shop have my first one and works great and would not believe was 5 years old, but she uses it all day every day so I have no doubt it is well built and durable! So what are you waiting for, won't regret it....for this price can spend way more just for warmer but it won't be better than this one!
customer_reviews.author: SOS1880

customer_reviews.title: Warmer makes it worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works every time so far and I’ve had it a good while now. Products that come with the warmer did not come sealed which I do not like or trust so did not use. I use other product in it.
customer_reviews.author: ThanxaLot

customer_reviews.title: Longtime Gigi Fan
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this kit. I had one of their other ones for years before I decided to upgrade due to normal wear and tear. What makes this kit special are the creams that came with it. My favorite one is the Wax-Off. It does the job and smells so good... better than the baby oil that I usually use to get the wax off.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Wax kit
customer_reviews.text: Love this it’s the second one I have purchased first one got ruined during a move would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It worked very well, better than salon waxing because I didn’t turn as red and blotchy. And in the end you do as it of money. Easy to use. Can get a bit messy but just try to be careful.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: First Timer - Couldn’t be more pleased!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little scared to start doing my own eyebrows for fear of removing more of hair and end up looking like an idiot. However, this is easy to use and the instructions are very clear. I learned to do a little at a time and will increase amount used as I get comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: What I like is easy to use and is effective. What I don't like that much is that you have to wait until the wax is ready, which is a usual thing. So I guess I have no complaints, but the wax can be painful to remove at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Amarilys Galloza

customer_reviews.title: Professional kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very professional waxing kit. It comes with everything you need. I've only used it once so far, and I ended up with wax all over my hands & cotton stuck to my skin. I think I need to practice technique! One thing I didn't like was the muslin strips. The little threads came off the edges. I've ordered a different kind of strips. Overall I think this is a good kit.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Saunders

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this kit
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this kit. I have zero prior experience with waxing and found it really straightforward and simple to use. Yes, of course it was a bit messy on the first try, but once you get the hang of it it's pretty simple to avoid getting the wax everywhere. I use this for my eyebrows, sideburns, and upper lip and have great results. Saves a ton of money in the long run! The only thing I suggest is to supply more wax collars. You'll definitely need to purchase a few extras if you plan on using this kit long term.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Gigi is a amazing product! Top when it comes to waxing. This is a great kit. I purchased this kit to replace another GIGI machine i owned. I ended up wanting to return this product because my current GIGI machine wasnt broken it just wasn't plugged in all the way. Customer service was FANTASTIC!!! They gave me no problems with the return. I highly recommend doing business the this company!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Novice waxer here with good results!
customer_reviews.text: Have to say I was pleasantly surprised. This was my first attempt at waxing myself, so I read the reviews here and watched a few video tutorials. I did order different strips to use at the recommendation of a friend. Took a while but got great results. I will be ordering a different wax remover as this one doesn’t do anything! Great deal and good product.
customer_reviews.author: Highlighted Blondie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Horrible experience- do NOT buy. Unsure where the positive reviews are coming from...I followed all insurrections and the wax is not only extremely poor quality (doesn’t remove hair, burns skin and leaves red marks even at recommended low temp, and is impossible to remove) but there are also apparently no returns. Unacceptable- very upset and disappointed by this product.
customer_reviews.author: qh

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Used this product in cosmetology school. Ordered during pandemic since all nail shops were closed. The wax gets super hot so be careful. Kit was well worth the money came with strips, lotions, and applicator. My only complaint is this came with a broken lid.
customer_reviews.author: Deidra Jones

customer_reviews.title: Didn't care for it
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure there is a technique for application, but this stuff doesn't pull easy not does it come off easy. It is a mess and just a tacky mess versus a wax persea. No thanks, I ordered hard wax and this kit was sent , hoping the hard wax is better or this is a complete waste of money
customer_reviews.author: stephanie cantin-smith

customer_reviews.title: Never again!
customer_reviews.text: did not remove any hair, i applied and only got a little hair off because the wax wouldn’t dry and i sat waiting for 30 minutes with still no hope, had to use my wax off to get the wax off the spots i TRIED to wax, the strips were not better!
customer_reviews.author: Aniya159

customer_reviews.title: I've had it for a couple weeks now and I've ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a couple weeks now and I've used it twice, for some reason it does not want to heat up anymore. I'd be careful, I guess I was unlucky and received a defective one
customer_reviews.author: Jay Santana

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Pack was not good. I got a package with spilled lotions, cracked top, simply disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Santa

customer_reviews.title: Wax on wax off
customer_reviews.text: This product is good just like the picture. The seller did good. I would recommend watching YouTube videos for first time.
customer_reviews.author: Jamaica

customer_reviews.title: DIY Save money and time
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second waxing kit I have bought. One for me and after using it for well over a year, one for my daughter. It is very easy to use. I've had mine around 2 years give/take and it works great. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: S Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very good wax removal system. Wish it had a screw on lid or something for storage
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything except that the lid on the wax cracked during the shipping process and leaked out.
customer_reviews.author: Salena

customer_reviews.title: Good for personal use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for personal use. My only complaint is the heating unit seems cheaply made. Also, it only comes with 1 disposable ring to catch the drip wax. Since this is for myself, I've just kept the same one on It and have just been careful. It is so much easier to go plug this in, turn it on, and wax myself, than try to go somewhere. The sticks are handier too with the ends being at a slant.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kit to start waxing for the first time! Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wax set! We have 3 girls in the family and so I finally thought we should have our own waxing kit. I really had no clue on which kit was best to purchase & gamble on this one. Its so easy to use after watching a few YouTube videos, I now feel 100% happy with purchasing this!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I really like this kit! Mine came in perfect condition and works great! Waxing at home is nice, going to a salon to do it is so expensive and time consuming. I have a friend who waxes me and then I wax her. It's a good ol' time, lots of laughter.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So let me start by saying I am not a professional nor am I in school the packaging was great it takes a learning curve but if u follow directions and watch a few you tube videos my waxing experience was great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ivette ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Save Money Wax at home.
customer_reviews.text: Professional grade wax warmer. Easy to use. I would get the sensitive skin wax vs regular. The kit starts you off with an ample supply of wax product and supplies. If you purchase separately you would pay more money. I recommend the kit!
customer_reviews.author: Monica C.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I work in a salon and we do a lot of waxing, I wanted a little kit for myself at home and I absolutely love this it is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I hate this product. It took me an hour just to get the product off of me!! It peeled off... kind of, and then their solution they gave to help take off didn’t work at all. I scrubbed and scrubbed to get off and even then it didn’t come off. I give this a 1 star because the wax was terrible. Warmer worked great
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Choate

customer_reviews.title: Sticky Mess
customer_reviews.text: I agree with Ma Katrina Yongque, when she says, " All purpose honey wax and it turned out to be a mess. The warmer works good but this is a waste of money. I could have bought it from other vendors. I had to buy another can of wax!" I was looking for it was a hard wax so it dries quickly and you just use use fingers to pull off. No sticky mess.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Hong

customer_reviews.title: They do need to pack it better, but I glued it and it is fine
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after reading all of the reviews and first, the lid came broken per everyone's review. They do need to pack it better, but I glued it and it is fine. The wax did take a couple of hours on high to heat up, but that was not a deal breaker for me since I am using it personally. I have used it once and it was great! I was paying $30 with to wax my eyebrows, upper lip and chin, so it has already mostly paid for itself. The wax worked great and I am really happy I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: DK25

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: I contacted the seller due to the fact I was missing pieces and I received a refund! All in all the product has treated both my eyebrows and underarms good. It is a good kit for anyone who wants to start waxing rather than paying someone. I think this gives you ease knowing you do not have to blow the extra money every other week on an appointment at the salon. I would buy it again & definitely refer a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

product_meta.title: GiGi Student Starter Hair Removal Waxing Kit
product_meta.description:
Size:1 pack

Are you planning on being a professional esthetician? Practice your hair waxing techniques with GiGi Student Starter Hair Removal Waxing Kit. 

GiGi Student Starter Hair Removal Waxing Kit is your perfect solution in polishing your waxing techniques. It contains everything you need for a hair removal treatment from start to finish. This kit features an easy-to-use wax warmer, the bestselling GiGi All Purpose Honee Wax, cleansers and after-wax treatments, plus applicators and muslin strips in various size, so you can get started. 

GiGi Student Starter Hair Removal Waxing Kit includes: 

 * Wax Warmer
 * All Purpose Honee, 14 Ounces
 * Pre Hon, 4 Ounces
 * Pre Epilation Powder, 2.5 Ounces
 * Wax Off, 4 Ounces
 * Slow Grow, 4 Ounces
 * Petite Applicators, 10 Pieces
 * Small Accu Edge Applicators, 10 Pieces
feature_bullets: WELCOME A SMOOTH, FLAWLESS HAIR-FREE SKIN: Wanting to have a smooth, flawless, hair-free skin, but too busy to go to the salon? With GiGi Student Starter Hair Removal Waxing Kit, you can have a professional waxing at the comfort of your home! This kit provides all you need for an ultimate full-body waxing. It includes an easy to use a wax warmer, the best-selling GiGi All Purpose Honee Wax, pre and post-waxing treatments, applicators and muslin strips in various sizes to help you get started!

MULTI-PURPOSE, PROFESSIONAL WAX WARMER: Gigi Wax Warmer accommodates most wax containers for 8 or 12 oz and most types of hard wax. Our warmer melts hard wax in less than 30 mins, providing faster heating performance compared to other wax warmers in the market. With its removable see-through cover, a temperature control lever, and a light indicator, it’s easy to get a hassle-free waxing anytime you want!

ALL PURPOSE HONEE WAX: Introducing Gigi’s best selling All Purpose Honee Hard Wax with its revolutionary creamy, strip free and gentle formula perfect for all skin types. This all-purpose hard wax is great for full body waxing and can pull all types of unwanted hairs. It’s so gentle it can be used on the face, underarms and bikini area. This hard wax is infused with honey extract, leaving your skin smooth and glowing after waxing.

COMPLETE PRE AND POST WAXING TREATMENTS: GiGi Student Starter Hair Removal Waxing Kit has essentials you need before and after your waxing session. Includes Pre Hon Cleanser to clean your skin, Pre Epilation Powder to absorb excess oils, Wax Off Wax Remover to gently remove all traces of wax from the skin, and Slow Grow Hair Minimizer that contains natural enzymes to slow down hair growth so you can enjoy hairless skin for weeks! Packed with treatments you need for an enjoyable waxing experience

PERFECT FOR BEGINNERS: Wax like a pro with our GiGi Student Starter Hair Removal Waxing Kit. A complete kit with professional-grade waxing products and an easy to follow instructions to be free from all unsightly hair all over your face and body! We want to make sure that you have everything you need for a fuss-free full body waxing. 100% cruelty-free, never tested on animals and proudly made in the USA. From GiGi - the brand preferred by estheticians and hair waxing pros worldwide.
